mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_entity ( name, category_id, color_id, price, stock, description, image_name, image_path ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{colorId}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{description}, #{imageName}, #{imagePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category_id, color_id, price, stock, image_name, image_path FROM product_entity WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY category_id ASC, id ASC
SELECT id, name, category_id, color_id, price, stock, description, image_name, image_path FROM product_entity WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY category_id ASC, id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE product_entity SET name = #{name}, category_id = #{categoryId}, color_id = #{colorId}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, description = #{description}, image_name = #{imageName}, image_path = #{imagePath}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE product_entity SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, deleted_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
